text: Pamela Donielle Oliver (born March 10, 1961) is the lead sideline reporter for the NFL on FoxFox Sports with Joe Buck and Troy Aikman. She also worked with Dick Stockton and Matt Millen. She also does sideline reporting for NBA playoffsCleveland Cavaliers for TNT. She was a reporter for the most popular show on ESPN SportsCenter. ==References== * Category:Living people Category:1961 births Category:National Basketball Association broadcasters Category:National Football League broadcasters Category:SportsCenter anchors and reporters
title: Pam Oliver
